alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 30 at 3:44PM CDT until April 02 at 5:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in St Louis MO has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Missouri... Cuivre River near Troy. River forecasts are based on observed precipitation and forecast precipitation for the next 48 hours. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING TO EARLY SATURDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Cuivre River near Troy. * WHEN...From Thursday morning to early Saturday morning. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Considerable agricultural land is flooded between Troy and Moscow Mills. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 13.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 22.4 feet early tomorrow afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage late tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 21.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sun Mon Cuivre River Troy 21.0 13.4 Wed 3 pm 22.4 15.2 9.6 8.3 7.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. This product, along with additional weather and stream information, is available at https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=lsx.
